Transform_Rules: CASE WHEN type_code = 'LOA' THEN 'funder_2_LOA' WHEN type_code = 'OA' THEN 'funder_2_Outcome_Agreement' ELSE 'funder_2_Migration_Variation' END
Notes: Map source codes to AMS types

Transform_Rules: CASE WHEN status_code = 'A' THEN 'Active' WHEN status_code = 'I' THEN 'Inactive' WHEN status_code = 'P' THEN 'Pending' ELSE 'Terminated' END
CASE WHEN has_performance_reporting = 'Y' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END
Notes: New field - convert Y/N to boolean
